field.label: Sandbox
field.comment: Enabling sandbox means that all your transactions will be in TEST mode.

field.label: Public key for test
field.comment: The "Test" mode public key can be found in Opn Payments Dashboard.

field.label: Secret key for test
field.comment: The "Test" mode secret key can be found in Opn Payments Dashboard.

field.label: Public key for live
field.comment: The "Live" mode public key can be found in Opn Payments Dashboard.

field.label: Secret key for live
field.comment: The "Live" mode secret key can be found in Opn Payments Dashboard.

field.label: Webhook
field.comment: Use webhook.

field.label: Webhook endpoint
field.comment: To enable WebHooks feature, you must copy the above url to setup an endpoint at Opn Payments dashboard (HTTPS only).

field.label: Enable Cron Autosync Order Status
field.comment: Enabling cron allows Magento to check orders with expired charge status and mark them as canceled.

field.label: Generate invoice at order status
field.comment: Invoices will be generated at the selected order state. This will impact invoice emails to customers as well.

group.label: Enable Credit Card Payment
group.comment: Powerful payment features that allows you to easily and securely accept credit/debit card payments on your store.

field.label: Enable/Disable
field.comment: Enable Credit Card Solution.

field.label: Title
field.comment: This controls the title which the user sees during checkout.

field.label: Secure Form
field.comment: Try the new secure form to accept card payments. The new form features additional controls to ensure PCI-DSS compliance. Using this form will be mandatory in a future release.

field.label: Secure Form Theme
field.comment: Credit/debit card secure form design on checkout page. Click here for more secure card form customization.

field.label: Allowed Countries
field.comment: If not set to all, guest customers will not have a billing country and may not be able to checkout.

group.label: Enable Internet Banking Payment
group.comment: Enable customers of a bank to easily conduct financial transactions through a bank-operated website (only available in Thailand).

field.label: Enable/Disable
field.comment: Enable Internet Banking payment method.

field.label: Title
field.comment: This controls the title which the user sees during checkout.

field.label: Allowed Countries
field.comment: If not set to all, guest customers will not have a billing country and may not be able to checkout.

group.label: Enable Google Pay Payment
group.comment: Enable customers to pay using credit/debit cards connected to their Google account.

field.label: Enable/Disable
field.comment: Enable Google Pay payment method.

field.label: Google Pay Merchant ID
field.comment: The merchant ID will be available after registering with the Google Pay Business Console. Only required for live mode.

field.label: Request Billing Address
field.comment: Request customer's name and billing address from their Google Account upon checkout.

field.label: Request Phone Number
field.comment: Request customer's phone number from their Google Account upon checkout when billing address is requested.

field.label: Title
field.comment: This controls the title which the user sees during checkout.
